remarks: Lemma for ~ dfon2 .  All elements of a new ordinal are new ordinals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Feb-2011.)
statement:
dfon2lem7.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
dfon2lem7 $p |- ( A. x ( ( x C. A /\ Tr x ) -> x e. A ) -> ( B e. A -> A. y ( ( y C. B /\ Tr y ) -> y e. B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
